name: Palm Sex Night's
description:
This is the place where unique creatures - Palms - are gathered. We have selected the sexiest of them and placed them in this beautiful attraction. But at night, they get very strange. Your task will be to survive the night and as a reward you can play with these beautiful creatures!

This game features very atmospheric and scary gameplay, several game modes and the ability to customize the game. You have to hold off the Palms using various tricks and doors. Lure them away with sound, close doors, and carefully monitor their energy levels.

Game features:
*Several game modes;
*Various enemies with unique AI;
*Sexy characters;
*Lots of screamers;
